participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and straightforward, but sometimes loses patience.
participant_1.background: my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. i live in canada. i did not graduate high school. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and carefree, with a creative spirit.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out my parents home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work at a part time job at burger king.
